revisions.rev:
{{Expand list|date=August 2008}} {{Labor}} The following is a list of deliberate absence from work related to specific working conditions ([[strike action|strikes]]) or due to general unhappiness with the political order ([[general strike]]s).
==Chronological list of [[strike action|strikes]]== ===Seventeenth century===
{| class="wikitable sortable" | Date | Strike | Location |- | 1619 | [[1619 Jamestown Polish craftsmen strike|Polish craftsmen strike]] | [[Jamestown, Virginia|Jamestown]], [[Virginia colony]] |- | 1636 | [[1636 Maine indentured sevants' and fisherman's mutiny|Indentured Servants' and Fisherman's Mutiny]] | [[Province of Maine]] |- | 1661 | [[Virginia's Indentured Servants' Plot]] | [[Virginia colony]] |- | 1663 | [[Maryland Indentured Servants' Strike]] | [[Province of Maryland]] |- | 1675 | [[Boston ship carpenter's Protest]] | [[Boston]], [[Massachusetts Bay colony]] |- | 1676 | [[Bacon's Rebellion]] | [[Virginia colony]] |- | 1677 | [[1677 New York City Carters' Strike|New York City Carters' Strike]] | [[Province of New York]] |- | 1684 | [[1684 New York City Carters' Strike|New York City Carters' Strike]] | [[Province of New York]] |}
===Eighteenth century===
{| class="wikitable sortable" | Date | Strike | Location |- | 1741 | [[New York City Bakers' Strike]] | [[New York City]], [[Province of New York]] |- | 1768 | [[Florida Indentured Servants' Revolt]] | [[East Florida]] |- | 1768 | [[New York City Tailors' Strike]] | [[New York City]], [[Province of New York]] |- | 1774 | [[Hibernia, New Jersey, Ironworks Strike]] | [[Province of New Jersey]] |- | 1787 | [[Calton Weavers Strike]] | [[Calton, Glasgow]], [[Scotland]] |- | 1791 | [[Philadelphia Carpenters â First Strike in the U.S. building trades]] | [[Philadelphia]], [[Pennsylvania]], [[United States]] |- | 1792 | [[Philadelphia River Pilots' Strike]] | [[Philadelphia]], [[Pennsylvania]], [[United States]] |}
